name: Make Your Own Keyboard File
summary: A KEYBOARD file contains a keyboard layout created by Make Your Own Keyboard, an iPadOS and iOS app for designing on-screen keyboards. It stores plain text information about the keyboard, including the layout of characters, values for each character, and modifier keys.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: KEYBOARD file open in Make Your Own Keyboard 1
images.alt: KEYBOARD file open in Make Your Own Keyboard 1
